name: Kombi Re-Knit Liner Glove - Men's
description:
These fitted gloves work great on their own for snowshoeing or approach hikes. Use them with outer gloves for colder conditions or multi-sport days.Fabric is recycled polyester blended with wool.Soft brushed inner.Cuffs are stretch knit for a good seal at the wrists.

        Sustainability
